title: Chapter 29: Butt-Aged Little Brat
body:
Chapter 29: Butt-Aged Little Brat

Chapter 29: Butt-Aged Little Brat


Please do not host elsewhere but Volare and Yumeabyss


“Hey! What are you looking for? Hurry up and come help!” When Tang Doudou lifted her eyes she discovered Jun Xin was currently looking at her with an odd expression and she immediately called him over to help. These ancient styled clothing are just a bother, it’s not convenient at all to move about in. Just kneading some dough caused her entire body to be covered with flour.


Please do not host elsewhere but Volare and Yumeabyss


Jun Xin rolled his eyes and humphed: “Wasn’t it you that told me to keep watch?”


Please do not host elsewhere but Volare and Yumeabyss


“If you keep watch just cause I told you to keep watch, if I told you to go eat shit will you just go and do it?”


Please do not host elsewhere but Volare and Yumeabyss


“You go eat shit!” Jun Xin angrily said. The dagger in his hand flashed with cold light and brushed past the side of Tang Doudou’s face, stabbing into the cupboard behind her.


Please do not host elsewhere but Volare and Yumeabyss


Then he coldly warned: “Work faster. Any more words and I’ll kill you!”


Please do not host elsewhere but Volare and Yumeabyss


This violent butt-aged little brat!


Please do not host elsewhere but Volare and Yumeabyss


“Cough, I’m just making a comparison. Don’t mind it too much……” Tang Doudou waved her hand. Not daring to call him again, she went to work busily herself.


Please do not host elsewhere but Volare and Yumeabyss


“Work a bit faster. Once it hits the next hour Meng Yu will come!” After a while, Jun Xin started to urge again.


Please do not host elsewhere but Volare and Yumeabyss


The dagger was still stabbed into the cupboard. Tang Doudou didn’t dare to infuriate him again and could only say with an annoyed tone: “What do you keep repeating for? I am hurrying!”


Please do not host elsewhere but Volare and Yumeabyss


“Making something this hurriedly and hastily, is it possible for it to taste good?” Jun Xin saw that she had bustled around half the day yet she still hadn’t made a fire and started to doubt Tang Doudou’s cooking skills again.


Please do not host elsewhere but Volare and Yumeabyss


Tang Doudou cursed him silently in her heart but her mouth replied: “Just watch your door properly, it’ll be ready in a moment.”


Please do not host elsewhere but Volare and Yumeabyss


Jun Xin gave a humph and ignored her.


Please do not host elsewhere but Volare and Yumeabyss


Damned tsundere!


Please do not host elsewhere but Volare and Yumeabyss


Half an hour went by.


Please do not host elsewhere but Volare and Yumeabyss


“Is it ready or not?!” Jun Xin stood up, unable to wait any longer: “Meng Yu is almost here!”


Please do not host elsewhere but Volare and Yumeabyss


“It’s almost ready, almost ready!” Tang Doudou fished out the thing in the pot and rolled it in the seasoning tray. A fragrant scent immediately filled the air.


Please do not host elsewhere but Volare and Yumeabyss


Smelling this Jun Xin’s heart tickled with a hard to endure itch. Where did he have the mind to still care about watching the door? He ran over, reached out, grabbed that strip and popped it into his mouth.


Please do not host elsewhere but Volare and Yumeabyss


“Ssss! So hot, so spicy!”


Please do not host elsewhere but Volare and Yumeabyss


The fragrant spicy taste exploded inside his mouth, a hundred flavors occurring at the same time! But it was really way too spicy, Jun Xin didn’t have the time to reflect on the taste. After swallowing it down in one bite, he stuck out his tongue and fanned it as if his life depended on it: “Why did you put chili! Don’t tell me you don’t know I don’t eat chili!”


Please do not host elsewhere but Volare and Yumeabyss


Huai City is a region in South Province and they don’t like eating chili. Jun Xin, this locally born and bred Huai City citizen was even less able to stand this spicy taste.


Please do not host elsewhere but Volare and Yumeabyss


Tang Doudou felt wrongly accused: “You never said that you didn’t eat it ah!”


Please do not host elsewhere but Volare and Yumeabyss


Jun Xin was speechless.


Please do not host elsewhere but Volare and Yumeabyss


Tang Doudou moved closer and asked: “How is it? How’s the taste?”


Please do not host elsewhere but Volare and Yumeabyss


Jun Xin paused for a moment, reflecting on the taste in his mouth: “The taste is actually not bad, it’s just a bit too spicy.”


Please do not host elsewhere but Volare and Yumeabyss


Even though it’s a bit spicy, the taste really was not bad. There was a sort of still wanting to eat more impulse after eating.


Please do not host elsewhere but Volare and Yumeabyss


Helplessly Jun Xin swept a glance at the chili oil filled tray. If it was just a little bit less spicy it’d be perfect.


Please do not host elsewhere but Volare and Yumeabyss


Seeing his thoughts, Tang Doudou laughed ‘hehe’ and said: “Wait a sec.”


Please do not host elsewhere but Volare and Yumeabyss


Jun Xin looked at her, not understanding. Tang Doudou lifted her brows and blended some less spicy ones and handed it to him: “Here, eat. Don’t worry, it’s not spicy!”


Please do not host elsewhere but Volare and Yumeabyss


Only then did Jun Xin unhurriedly pick up the chopsticks and clip a piece. Hesitantly putting it into his mouth, his expression froze. Immediately, happiness rose to the surface.


Please do not host elsewhere but Volare and Yumeabyss


Even though it was still a bit spicy, it was within a tolerable range.


Please do not host elsewhere but Volare and Yumeabyss


And precisely because it wasn’t too spicy, that savory spice became even more rich. This time when he started eating he couldn’t stop anymore. One piece after another was thrown into his mouth. During an idle time he didn’t forget to ask Tang Doudou: “What’s this thing called?”


Please do not host elsewhere but Volare and Yumeabyss


“Spicy strips!” Tang Doudou chuckled ‘hehe’ as she picked up that extremely spicy plate and put it into a food box.


Spicy strips


Seeing this, Jun Xin asked again: “You’re leaving?”


Please do not host elsewhere but Volare and Yumeabyss


“My stomach is full, the tasty thing is also made. If I don’t leave then do I wait here for you to ask me out to eat?” Tang Doudou patted the food box. Walking to the window, she looked outside, then put the food box on the windowsill, about to climb out the window and leave.


Please do not host elsewhere but Volare and Yumeabyss


“There’s a good door right here for you to walk through, what are you going out the window for?” Jun Xin knitted his brows, seeing her climb several times but still unable to climb out. He couldn’t help but roll his eyes, how could there be someone this stupid in the world?


Please do not host elsewhere but Volare and Yumeabyss


“When have you ever seen someone steal something then walk out the front door?” Tang Doudou disdainfully humphed. With a push she jumped out. Picking up the food box, she waved her hand at Jun Xin: “Butt-aged little brat, I’m leaving first! Byebye~”


Please do not host elsewhere but Volare and Yumeabyss


Hearing those words, Jun Xin’s face instantly turned black. With a move of his hand, the dagger returned to his grasp.


Please do not host elsewhere but Volare and Yumeabyss


Seeing this, how could Tang Doudou still hang around and wait for him to make a move against her. Bending down at her waist, she felt along the wall and left.


Please do not host elsewhere but Volare and Yumeabyss


Butt-aged little brat, don’t blame jiejie for being hard-hearted towards you. Without selling you out, jiejie wouldn’t be able to walk out ah!


Please do not host elsewhere but Volare and Yumeabyss


Giggling ‘hehe’, she heard a loud ‘bang’ sound.


Please do not host elsewhere but Volare and Yumeabyss


Immediately following that was the sound of Jun Xin’s miserable shriek mixed with an angry howl as if the lioness from Hedong was roaring: “Jun Xin you little son of a bitch! You’re here to steal food again! Bastard! Do you know who sent that deer meat!? I’m, I’m gonna beat you to death!”


Please do not host elsewhere but Volare and Yumeabyss


“Ah! Don’t hit the face!”


Please do not host elsewhere but Volare and Yumeabyss


……


Please do not host elsewhere but Volare and Yumeabyss


Moving along the wall to the door, she peeked in. A devastated miserable shriek came through. Tang Doudou’s guts shook and she hurriedly moved far away from the kitchen and walked back to the original road.


Please do not host elsewhere but Volare and Yumeabyss


“Li gongzi!”


Please do not host elsewhere but Volare and Yumeabyss


Just as she walked out of the courtyard she heard Qing Yin’s surprised call.


Please do not host elsewhere but Volare and Yumeabyss


Before she even had the time to stand steadily, the pretty figure appeared in front of her: “Li gongzi, I’ve finally found you!”


Please do not host elsewhere but Volare and Yumeabyss


“Qing Yin, you came just in time. Hurry and bring me to Baili Yu!” She was just fretting that she couldn’t find someone to bring her to find Baili Yu, this Qing Yin really came just at the right time.


Please do not host elsewhere but Volare and Yumeabyss


Qing Yin wiped the sweat on her forehead and replied: “Li gongzi, Master isn’t here in the garden right now.”


Please do not host elsewhere but Volare and Yumeabyss


“Not here?” Tang Doudou looked at the food box in her hand, disappointed.


Please do not host elsewhere but Volare and Yumeabyss


Following her gaze and looking over, seeing the box Qing Yin curiously asked: “What is this?”


Please do not host elsewhere but Volare and Yumeabyss


“It’s something good!” Tang Doudou reached out and was just about to open the lid of the box when she suddenly froze: “Qing Yin, can I ask a favor of you?”


Please do not host elsewhere but Volare and Yumeabyss


“There is no harm in gongzi stating it.”


Please do not host elsewhere but Volare and Yumeabyss


“I made some food, can you help me send it to Baili Yu?”


Please do not host elsewhere but Volare and Yumeabyss


He’s saying, the stuff in this food box was made by him? Qing Yin was quite surprised and asked: “Gongzi disappeared for half the day without a trace, it was to go make something to eat?”


Please do not host elsewhere but Volare and Yumeabyss


Tang Doudou handed the box over to her: “Don’t worry about so much. Just help me send it to Baili Yu!”


Please do not host elsewhere but Volare and Yumeabyss


Qing Yin’s expression was troubled and didn’t take the food box: “This, Meng Yu jiejie has always been in charge of Master’s food. This servant doesn’t dare make a decision without permission. If you want to gift it, it’s best if gongzi goes yourself.”


Please do not host elsewhere but Volare and Yumeabyss


“Didn’t you say he wasn’t in the garden? If he’s not in the garden, how am I supposed to gift it?”


Please do not host elsewhere but Volare and Yumeabyss


“This……”


Please do not host elsewhere but Volare and Yumeabyss


“Damned little bastard, you still dare to run! When I catch you, see how I’ll sort you out!”


Please do not host elsewhere but Volare and Yumeabyss


At this time, a black figure flashed over the wall and dropped down in front of the two.


Please do not host elsewhere but Volare and Yumeabyss


“Jun Xin, why are you here?”


Please do not host elsewhere but Volare and Yumeabyss


If the person that dropped down wasn’t the Jun Xin Tang Doudou left behind in the kitchen to distract Meng Yu, who else could it be? By this time, he had long lost his earlier arrogance. When he heard Qing Yin’s voice, he immediately rolled over here: “Qing Yin, hurry and save me!”


Please do not host elsewhere but Volare and Yumeabyss


“Hahaha……” Seeing his pathetic appearance, Tang Doudou couldn’t help but burst out laughing.


Please do not host elsewhere but Volare and Yumeabyss


Qing Yin helplessly asked Jun Xin: “Jun Xin, did you steal food again?”


Please do not host elsewhere but Volare and Yumeabyss


“I didn’t, the one that stole food was him! I’m being framed!” Jun Xin heard Tang Doudou’s laugh and recalling how she abandoned him in the kitchen while running off alone got angry to the point he couldn’t breath properly. Pointing at Tang Doudou he said: “Baili Yu’s pot of deer meat was all eaten by him!”


Please do not host elsewhere but Volare and Yumeabyss


“You’re talking about that deer the Chamber of Commerce sent over this morning?”


Please do not host elsewhere but Volare and Yumeabyss


“What other one is there?” Jun Xin covered his face. Everytime, she(Meng Ru) always hits his face, too hateful!


Please do not host elsewhere but Volare and Yumeabyss


“Qing Yin, you’re also here?” Sounds of ‘thump thump thump’s transmitted over. Tang Doudou looked over and only saw a five larges three coarsesG woman panting as she ran out from the courtyard. From the looks of it she was probably around thirty. The two enormous lumps in front of her chest bounced back and forth with her running motions. Every step roused a giant amount of dust, yet her speed was still very fast. In a blink she got to them, gasping so heavily for air that Tang Doudou couldn’t even open her eyes.


Please do not host elsewhere but Volare and Yumeabyss


It was hard to imagine that Meng Yu was actually such a heavyweight lady.


Please do not host elsewhere but Volare and Yumeabyss


“Meng Yu jiejie.”


Please do not host elsewhere but Volare and Yumeabyss


“Help, help me catch that brat! Master, Master’s deer meat was secretly eaten by him! Too hateful! I already told Master not to let him in yet Master just refuses to listen every single time! Now it’s just great, he steals food every single day! Seriously infuriating me to death!” Meng Yu ferociously put her hands on her hips as she rained curses.


Please do not host elsewhere but Volare and Yumeabyss


Jun Xin poked his head out from behind Qing Yin’s back. Rubbing his eyes, he said: “Meng Yu, don’t frame the innocent. Your deer meat was secretly eaten by this brat, it has nothing to do with me at all!”


Please do not host elsewhere but Volare and Yumeabyss


“Pei! When I entered the kitchen I saw you!”


Please do not host elsewhere but Volare and Yumeabyss


“That’s cause he sneaked away first!” Jun Xin furiously glared at Tang Doudou: “Stinky little brat, you dare to eat but you don’t dare to admit?”


Please do not host elsewhere but Volare and Yumeabyss


This dumb little brat, selling her out just like this. She wasted so many of her spicy strips bribing him! Tang Doudou rolled her eyes. Seeing Meng Yu also glare over, she immediately exposed an extremely innocent expression: “What deer meat? What are you guys talking about? I can’t understand any of it? Hey, that guy whoever you are, we’re total strangers, don’t randomly try to accuse me!”


Please do not host elsewhere but Volare and Yumeabyss


This string of words were spoken exceedingly bold and confidently with the sound of justice on her side. Jun Xin’s eyes flipped over, almost fainting from the anger.


Please do not host elsewhere but Volare and Yumeabyss


“Young. Fellow. Jun!” Meng Yu fumed with rage between gritted teeth.


Please do not host elsewhere but Volare and Yumeabyss


“Qing Yin!” Seeing that Meng Yu had already decided it was him, Jun Xin immediately grabbed Qing Yin’s sleeve and pitifully pleaded: “Help me, it really wasn’t me!”


Please do not host elsewhere but Volare and Yumeabyss


Even though Jun Xin was beaten by Meng Yu to an inch of his life, but his identity wasn’t simple at all. Of all the people at Baili Yu’s side, there was only Meng Yu that dared to yell and beat him like this. And it’s just because Meng Yu’s culinary skill was seriously good and Jun Xin was also a gluttonous guy. Yet he just wouldn’t eat at the proper place and insists on running to the kitchen to steal food and even has to choose the food Meng Yu specially prepared for Master. Over time, every time Jun Xin came here to steal food it would be noisy to the point chickens fly and dogs leap.


Please do not host elsewhere but Volare and Yumeabyss


After a long time of this, everyone got used to it.


Please do not host elsewhere but Volare and Yumeabyss


But yet this time Li Xueyi also got mixed up in it. Meng Yu didn’t know but she knew. The food box in Tang Doudou’s hand was precisely the one that Meng Yu often uses to carry the Master’s meals in.


Please do not host elsewhere but Volare and Yumeabyss


Even though Jun Xin liked to pilfer food, he would admit it every time he was caught. So for this incident to not be related to Li Xueyi, she, Qing Yin didn’t believe it at all.


Please do not host elsewhere but Volare and Yumeabyss


“Meng Yu jiejie, I think we should just let this go.”


Please do not host elsewhere but Volare and Yumeabyss


“Let it go?” Meng Yu’s voice got even louder, thundering to the point that everyone present had to cover their ears: “You’re telling me to just let it go! Then Master’s blame, who will bear it for me! And that’s an extremely rare nine color deer, it’s an ingredient I might never have a second chance to work with in this lifetime!”


Please do not host elsewhere but Volare and Yumeabyss


When she spoke to the end, her loud voice started sobbing. Her shaking as she sobbed frightened Tang Doudou to the point her heart trembled and trembled.


Please do not host elsewhere but Volare and Yumeabyss


“Wuuuwwuu…… Do you guys get it?! Do you get it!?”


Please do not host elsewhere but Volare and Yumeabyss


Meng Yu cried pitifully, in the end she collapsed to a sit onto the floor. Jun Xin scratched his head, particularly uncomfortable. He shot another glare at Tang Doudou.


Please do not host elsewhere but Volare and Yumeabyss


Tang Doudou actually did quite understand Meng Yu’s feelings. When a good cook encounters a rare ingredient, it’s like when an old Buddhist monk who hadn’t seen any females for a few dozen years sees a drop dead beautiful lady; they can’t stop themselves.


Please do not host elsewhere but Volare and Yumeabyss
